sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.TablesSchemaHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TablesSchemaHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TablesSchemaHelper = Class.create();
TablesSchemaHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this._licensingEngineTableDescriptor = new global.LicensingEngineTableDescriptor();
        this._tableInfoService = new TableInfoService();
    },

    getRelatedTables: function(tableName) {
        //get ancestor table
        var relatedTables = this._tableInfoService.getTableHierarchy(tableName);
        //get reference tables
        return relatedTables.concat(this._licensingEngineTableDescriptor.getReferencedTables(tableName));
    },

	isvalidTable : function(tableName){
		return this._licensingEngineTableDescriptor.isValid(tableName);
	},

    type: 'TablesSchemaHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-06-29 04:51:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>42872edc43f36110f3063fea8eb8f258</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TablesSchemaHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_42872edc43f36110f3063fea8eb8f258</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-08 18:13:50</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
